# mdc-card-primary-content

If a majority of the card (or even the entire card) should be actionable,
you can add the `<mdc-card-primary-content>` to the region to give it MDC Ripple styles.

You should also assign tabindex="0" to ensure it can also be interacted with via keyboard.


<!-- Auto Generated Below -->


## Slots

| Slot        | Description     |
| ----------- | --------------- |
| `"default"` | Primary content |


----------------------------------------------

*Built with [StencilJS](https://stenciljs.com/)*
